markdownRemark.html:
The 2023 IEEE Workshop on Applications of Signal Processing to Audio and Acoustics has just taken place, and we are please to announce that the following paper awards were given to C4DM members:

  • C4DM PhD student Saurjya Sarkar has been given the Best Student Paper Award for the paper titled "Leveraging synthetic data for improving chamber ensemble separation" - you can read a postprint at: https://qmro.qmul.ac.uk/xmlui/handle/123456789/89844

  • SMC MSc student Matthew Rice, C4DM & AIM PhD student Christian Steinmetz, and C4DM academics George Fazekas and Josh Reiss have been given the Best Paper Award for the paper titled "General Purpose Audio Effect Removal" - you can read a postprint at: https://qmro.qmul.ac.uk/xmlui/handle/123456789/91026

Congratulations to all! You can explore C4DM's contributions for WASPAA 2023 at: https://c4dm.eecs.qmul.ac.uk/news/news.2023-10-09.C4DM_at_WASPAA_2023.html

(25th October 2023)
